items.content_html: PassForge is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to generate secure, random passwords effortlessly. Customize password length, include special characters, and ensure your online security with ease. Perfect for enhancing personal and professional account safety!
items.title: Kanishk00001/passforge: PassForge is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to generate secure, random passwords effortlessly. Customize password length, include special characters, and ensure your online security with ease. Perfect for enhancing personal and professional account safety!

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight web application that converts Latin characters into Georgian script. This project is aimed at helping users quickly and accurately convert Latin-based text to Georgian.
items.title: iarumasi/lat2geo: A simple and lightweight web application that converts Latin characters into Georgian script. This project is aimed at helping users quickly and accurately convert Latin-based text to Georgian.

items.content_html: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
items.title: mankarshubham81/super-chat: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.

items.content_html: A fast and responsive weather app that provides real-time weather data for any location. Built using modern web technologies like React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, this web-app offers a smooth, lightweight user experience.

items.content_html: GenHash is a lightweight browser extension that generates random passwords and hashes text using well-known algorithms, all processed locally.

items.content_html: 🌍 RU-MAP is a lightweight library for web applications, following capabilities: region selecting, selecting of the federal district, selecting a time zone (with information about the difference from UTC+0 in minutes)
items.title: ibeloyar/ru-map: 🌍 RU-MAP is a lightweight library for web applications, following capabilities:  region selecting, selecting of the federal district, selecting a time zone (with information about the difference from UTC+0 in minutes)

items.content_html: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
items.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently.  A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

items.title: emberjs/data: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.
